definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Try to report these details using your scientific knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 利用你的科学知识设法报道这些细节。

sentences.english: Last but not least, I've learn many new tec here.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我在这里更学到了很多先进的科学知识。

sentences.english: The printing press helped diffuse scientific knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 印刷品有助于传播科学知识。

sentences.english: All that we learn from science militates decisively against that conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 我们所学的科学知识与此结论是截然冲突的。

sentences.english: But by the impingement from western scientific knowledge, Chinese traditional view of knowledge gradually changed.
sentences.chinese: 但在西方科学知识的冲击下，传统的知识观逐渐动摇。

sentences.english: For example, a few of the graduate-entry medicine degrees might require some knowledge of science.
sentences.chinese: 比如说，有些本科生入读的药学学位需要有科学知识。

sentences.english: Many policy areas depend on the spread of reliable scientific knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 很多政策领域都依赖可靠的科学知识传播。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, the Sociology of Science and Knowledge (SSK) takes a new look at it.
sentences.chinese: 然而，科学知识社会学却对之进行了社会学的解构。

sentences.english: For the birth of all kinds of scientific knowledge, each has its own origin and develop mental law.
sentences.chinese: 各类科学知识的诞生，都有其自身的根由与发展规律。

sentences.english: Science history can also help students understand why scientific knowledge grows ever more accurate.
sentences.chinese: 科学史可以帮助学生理解科学知识正变得更加准确。

sentences.english: What is technology? The application of scientific knowledge for practical purpose, especially in industry.
sentences.chinese: 技术是指以实践特别是工业上对科学知识的应用。

sentences.english: My knowledge of science is patchy.
sentences.chinese: 我的科学知识只是一鳞半爪。

sentences.english: His conception of power toward the knowledge of science has exerted considerable influence on science of post?modernism.
sentences.chinese: 他的科学知识权力观对后现代科学产生了重要影响。

sentences.english: Hawking's god is a god-of-the-gaps used to plug present gaps in our scientific knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 霍金的神是一个被用来填补我们的科学知识缝隙的神。

sentences.english: Lastly, present some epistemic difficulties of the epistemic normativity of scientific knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 然后提出一些科学知识的认识规范性的认知困境。

sentences.english: His discoveries have put a new face on our scientific knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他的发现使我们的科学知识的面貌为之一新。

definition: to make learning fun/to combine education and entertainment
popular science/popularization of science/abbr. of 科學普及|科学普及
